sub_title: Procesleider Dienstregeling 2025 bij de Nederlandse Spoorwegen
summary: I love making improvements, and opportunities for improvement abound. In the field of Asset Management, I often see physical assets underperforming and driven employees obstructed by their organization. I belief alignment is the answer to both problems: all efforts within the company should be focused towards the same goal: adding value with the assets. My analytical mind and experience in the world of asset management allow me to see improvement potential and to help organizations to yield additional value from their assets. Both at the Netherlands Railways and through my own company Samoa Asset Management I work every single day towards tomorrow's asset management.
